recipesJson.name: Watson Silver remix
recipesJson.author: fadedjay1
recipesJson.description:
Recently had OPMH's Wattson Silver Tobacco. Described as a creamy butterscotch with full tobacco. Real good. Lead me to build a recipe very similar to the orginal but not as sweet butterscotch forward as the OG. 

Butterscotch Custard Tobacco.

Used a magnetic stir for 4 hour. I would steep 2 weeks or more.

reviews.text: Really good mix! My girlfriend is really picky about recipes and  she only vapes tobacco flavors. This recipe opened her eyes to other notes besides tobacco. Really came together   after a month. 2 months made it magical. Thanks for your time to make and share this recipe!
